Container.Name: DumbWhoIs
Container.Overview: A simple web application for looking up WHOIS, IP, and ASN information using free APIs. The application automatically detects the type of query and provides formatted results with a clean, modern UI that supports both light and dark modes.
Container.DonateText: Don't donate to me! Instead, please donate the creators of the apps, but if you insist

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: The port on which the application will run.
